title: first_chapter_start
body:
That guy is in some deep shit!
I must help him

[[stop]]

title: help
body:
You need so help?
Yes, my sister just ate her legs
And I'm injured badly
Look pal, come to my tribe
My doctors will nurse you

[[stop]]

title: new_beginnings
body:
Something must have done this to him
I must go investigate

[[stop]]

title: problem
body:
That is an issue..
Lets deal with it

[[stop]]

title: ammo
body:
An ammo bag, lucky me
I might find a use for it

[[stop]]

title: gone
body:
I think that is all for now
Strange they got to these parts
I got to do something
before it's too late
[[stop]]

title: from_the_frying_pan
body:
What now for gods sake
I better deal with that
[[stop]]

title: the_white_rider
body:
He is done
But it is all confusing
I must get to the bottom of this
Before who knows what will happen

[[stop]]
